source_id: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_035_chunk1
evidence_span: Expanding mandrel (Simulated Fuel Expansion or Simfex) pellet-cladding interaction (PCI) simulation tests were performed on unirradiated Zircaloy-2, Zircaloy-4, zirconium-lined Zircaloy-2, Zircaloy-3A alloy-lined Zircaloy-2, and graphite-lined Zircaloy-4 tubing with high-purity argon and iodine.

source_id: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_035_chunk5
evidence_span: The iodine sensitivity tests covered the interval from 7- to 295-Pa iodine. These tests were performed at a test temperature of $3 5 0 \mathrm { { ‰} }$ and a core compression rate of 11.9 to 13.3 $\mu \mathrm { m } / \mathrm { m i n }$
conditions: iodine partial pressure 7-295 Pa, temperature 350°C, core compression rate 11.9-13.3 μm/min

extra_properties.diametral_fracture_strain: constant for 35-295 Pa iodine, large increase at 7 Pa
extra_properties.fracture_surface_behavior: brittle for 35-295 Pa, 99% ductile at 7 Pa

source_id: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_035_chunk5
evidence_span: Figure 16 shows that the maximum diametral fracture strain values measured for both Zircaloy-2 and zirconium-lined Zircaloy-2 tubing (at $3 5 0 ^ { \circ } \mathrm { C } )$ are in good agreement
conditions: temperature 350°C, core compression rate <11.9 μm/min, iodine partial pressure 47 Pa

extra_properties.maximum_diametral_fracture_strain: good agreement between Zircaloy-2 and zirconium-lined Zircaloy-2

source_id: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_035_chunk6
evidence_span: Three types of recrystallized Zircaloy-4 plates have been studied at room temperature in a methyl alcohol solution of iodine (iodine concentration $ l = 1 0 ^ { - 3 } l ,$ and in dry air as a reference medium
test_type: fatigue test, crack growth rate measurement
conditions: room temperature, methyl alcohol solution of iodine (iodine concentration 10^-3), dry air

extra_properties.fracture_mechanism: grains fractured by pseudo-cleavage and fatigue with striation spacings similar to dry air
extra_properties.test_specimens: double cantilever beam (DCB), center notched (CN), smooth tensile type
